title: Benchmarking Event concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the benchmarking event. If it is possible, it should be something meaningful, like an URL

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

parent_benchmarking_event_id.title: The parent benchmarking event, in case of subcategories in a challenge

dates.title: Relevant dates for this benchmarking event

creation.title: Creation date of the benchmarking event

modification.title: Last modification date of the benchmarking event

public.title: The date when this benchmarking event becomes public

url.title: The link to the benchmarking event

community_id.title: The community id where this benchmarking event belongs

dataset_ids.title: The datasets which every participant in this event must take into account

dataset_id.title: The id of a dataset which was used to generate this new dataset

role.title: The role of this dataset in the benchmarking event

participants.title: The initial participants of this challenge (it shouldn't change after the challenge ends). There will be a testEvent for each participant

test_event_id.title: The unique identifier of the test event for this participant

name.title: A symbolic name of the participant

tool_id.title: The id of a participating tool

contact_ids.title: The contacts of the participants with this tool

metrics_tool_ids.title: The metric(s) (defined as tools) which must be run over all the results provided by the participants

items.title: The id of a tool which computes metrics for this benchmarking event

references.title: The benchmarking event reference id(s) (if any)
